title: Lost Princess
description: Bella wanted to run away from reality. Nothing at school was going well, or at home for that matter. So she decided to escape to the world of The Internet, where she could pretend about everything and make virtual friends instead.  Meeting White Knight online turned her life around. It was going so well, until he started getting personal, and he decided ... that he wanted to meet her. Bella didn't see the harm in doing so, but there were unexpected dangers lurking ...
author: Anfal Khaliq
